question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
If the Runner plays [Legwork](/en/card/05035) while Dedicated Neural Net is scored and loses the Psi game, does the Corp choose the cards the Runner will access one at a time, or does the Corp choose a set of cards and the Runner accesses them in any order?
answer:
The Corp chooses a set of cards for the runner to access of size equal to the number of cards the Runner will access from HQ, then the Runner accesses them one at a time in the order of the Runnerâ€™s choosing.

If the Corp has scored Dedicated Neural Net and wins the Psi game, what happens when an [Information Sifting](/en/card/10079) run is successful?
